reviewText: I bought this hopeing for something to learn. I watched this with an open mind. I could tell as soon as I saw the teacher in his basement that this was not going to be much of anything. I watched all in hopes that I could pick up something. I found nothing pratical or worth while. I would advise everyone not to waste there money and buy this garbage. If you want my ten year old could teach someone how to fight better than this..  Yes,it really is this bad..............
